Commands.Solid Barrel+: 5-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Medium Initial BRV Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Ability Recovery Attack Up: Recovers 1 use of 「Solid Barrel」 and 「Renzokuken」 (up to the initial values)  Slightly raises Attack for 4 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Assault Trigger: 8-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Lionheart I」 for 5 turns   「Lionheart」 raises Attack and Max BRV based on the number of stacks  「Lionheart」 stacks cannot be increased by subsequent 「Assault Trigger」 uses

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Solid Barrel Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Solid Barrel.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Solid Barrel Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Solid Barrel.
Passives.Renzokuken Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Renzokuken.
Passives.Solid Barrel Charge: Increases the max uses of Solid Barrel by 1.
Passives.BRV Danger Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Renzokuken Charge: Increases the max uses of Renzokuken by 1.
Passives.A Lion's Pride: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is lower than Initial BRV.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Solid Barrel Extend: Increases Solid Barrel's max uses by 2.When using Solid Barrel/+:- Tremendously raises its potency.- Solid Barrel/+'s last BRV hit turns to an AoE BRV Attack.- Grants Solitary Lion for 5 turns.When using Solid Barrel:- Triggers an HP attack after use if BRV is above 80% Max BRV.When using Solid Barrel+:- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack after use.While Solitary Lion is active:- Turns Solid Barrel to Solid Barrel+ disregarding its Initial BRV condition.- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 3-HIT melee BRV attack + 1-HIT melee AoE BRV attack.Solitary Lion moderately raises Initial BRV and slightly raises Max BRV and Attack.
Passives.Buff Boost&High Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and greatly raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Renzokuken Extend: Increases Renzokuken's max uses by 1.When using Renzokuken/+:- Tremendously raises its potency.When using Renzokuken:- Deals 50% HP damage to other targets.When using Renzokuken+:- Deals 100% HP damage to other targets.While Solitary Lion is active:- Turns Renzokuken to Renzokuken+ disregarding its Initial BRV condition.- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+.- HP Attack+ is a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack that deals 50% HP damage to other enemies.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Ability Recovery Attack Up Extend: When using  Ability Recovery Attack Up :- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Twin Lance CP: 15: Increases the potency of Solid Barrel.
Weapons.Greatsword of an Otherworldly Lion CP: 1: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Solid Barrel ,  Solid Barrel+ ,  Renzokuken  and  Renzokuken+
Weapons.Cutting Trigger CP: 35: Increases Renzokuken's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: When using  Ability Recovery Attack Up :- Duration of  Attack Up  effect +4 turns
Weapons.Shear Trigger CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Assault Trigger .
Weapons.Sol Blade CP: 15: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV when HP is over 80%.
